details.publicNotes: Sea Gnoll legends tell tales of birds with wings like the most ancient of dragons, where even the slightest of wing strokes is enough to create booming thunder that can be heard for miles around. Unfortunately, no such creature has been created by The Author, at least not on such a majestic scale. While the Thunder Hummingbird had traditionally been a Gnoll pet for countless generations under the belief that it was such a creature's offspring, but it has stuck around because it's been a valuable aid for Gnoll gadgets of all sorts, assuming you can put up with the constant thundering of its wingbeats. It even seems capable of learning some surprisingly complex techniques for something so small, such as maintenance for a flintlock pistol. In recent years, however, it's become popular with the pegasus tribe for being able to handle and survive bad weather better than any other bird that's readily available on Everglow.

description.value: The Thunder Hummingbird loves to drinking lightning like nectar, but as constructs are typically powered by lightning, to a Thunder Hummingbird they're like shiny candy with a creamy filling. Target construct must be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, or willing and within the Thunder Hummingbird's reach.
